modName: The Art of Skyrim E8 - DELETED
summary: The Art of Skyrim showcases some of the latest and greatest screenshots/art taken and or made by the community.
descriptionHtml:
[center][line]

[size=6]DESCRIPTION[/size]
[line]

The Art of Skyrim is a video series that showcases some of the latest and greatest screenshots/art taken and or made by the community.

 Each screenshot/art has been credited to the original owner and is stamped with their username in the video. 

All screenshots/art are from the Skyrim/Skyrim Special Edition Nexus.
[line]

[size=6]EPISODE 8[/size]
[line]

[youtube]pUuGldWPPEc[/youtube]

[line]

[size=6]STAY UPDATED![/size]
[line]

Join [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/TheArtofSkyrim]The Art of Skyrim[/url] Steam group for notifications when a new episode is released!

[line][/center]
author: Rhys Ian Harris
